name: The Eraser
description:
Move with the arrow keys and WASD

Jump with SPACE, up arrow or W

When you have bugs collected(which you can see in the top left corner) press LMB to deactivate a grey(static box) or green (box which can fall) then you can press RMB to reactivate it.

The game is very unfinished, buggy, ugly and very unpolished because we began to late and communication with each other were, well not that great.

We at least had fun making this and we hope you to have fun playing this.

Credits:

Jeebs - Art

MP - Audio

Schweini - Programming

Lehip - Game Design

Tigerz900
